JUDGES: Carlo Ranzoni;Egidijus Kūris;Ganna Yudkivska;Iulia Motoc;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Mr PERSON , was a NORP national who was born in DATE and lived in PERSON . He was represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in ORG . The applicant died on DATE . His daughter , PERSON , born in DATE , applied to pursue the application before the ORG in his name and retained the same lawyer to represent her .
CARDINAL . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON , of ORG .
CARDINAL . The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG opened criminal proceedings against the applicant and CARDINAL co - accused for fraud and aiding and abetting fraud .
ORG - am adunat pentru a trage țepe , dar nu am gandit - o de o aşa mare amploare ) .
